title: Guangzhou closes to most arrivals as China's outbreak grows - The Associated Press
content: Guangzhou closes to most arrivals as China's outbreak grows  The Associated PressView Full Coverage on Google News
description: BEIJING (AP) â€” The manufacturing hub of Guangzhou closed itself to most arrivals Monday as China battles a major COVID-19 surge in its big eastern cities.  Shanghai has taken the brunt of the rise, with another 26,087 cases announced on Monday, only 914 of which showed symptoms.
